content.title: Map Logout to Home
content.body:
1. Navigate to the Data & Services panel on the top right of your canvas.
  2. Expand Project Services > Identity > employeeUserStore.
  3. Drag and drop the logout operation onto the frmHome form on your canvas.
  4. Navigate to the Project explorer > Responsive Web /Desktop > frmHome and select flexlogout.
  5. From the Properties panel on the top right of your canvas, select Look.
  6. Under Flex, modify the values of the following properties
    • Top:40%
    • Width: 40%
    • CenterX: 50%
